channel.title: Help with easy things
channel.description:
how do you do the following: - change the starting location - change the starter set - change what is in the shops - change the exp rate - and why cant i use ::pickup 1325 1? is it disabled? how can i enable this again? - how to change pk zones, and how to make a button emote for PK, Home, Training... etc.
Thansk for all your help guys.

item.title: Help with easy things
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Some of you people really need to read the Java tutorials, that would help. ‘Player class’ means the class named Player, that most commonly is abstract. If you want to learn real Java and understand Java as a whole, read this;
Java sun tutorials.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with easy things
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Open the java file.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with easy things
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

  • Player class
  • Initialize method
  • Shops.cfg
  • Attack & AttackNPC methods
  • You may need a certain rights to use it, check the customCommand method
  • You can edit it by making an inArea boolean for the areas, and edit packet 185

Read full topic

item.title: Help with easy things
item.dc:creator: @fruits fruits
item.description:
@fruits wrote:

how do you do the following:

  • change the starting location
  • change the starter set
  • change what is in the shops
  • change the exp rate
  • and why cant i use ::pickup 1325 1? is it disabled? how can i enable this again?
  • how to change pk zones, and how to make a button emote for PK, Home, Training… etc.

Thansk for all your help guys.

Read full topic
